title: About Interflow
intro: Interflow is a complete customer service and CRM platform designed for businesses of all sizes. Our mission is to simplify customer communication and boost sales through an integrated and intuitive solution.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To transform the way companies communicate with their customers, offering a platform that unifies all communication channels and simplifies relationship management.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2022, Interflow was born from the realization that companies faced major challenges when trying to manage multiple communication channels and centralize customer information. Our journey began with the development of a solution that easily integrates various channels such as WhatsApp, email, social media, and web chat into a single platform.

values.title: Our Values
items: Simplicity: We believe complex technology should be presented simply
Innovation: We are constantly evolving our platform with new features
Security: Privacy and data protection are absolute priorities
Support: We offer exceptional support because we understand the importance of communication
Integration: We develop solutions that connect easily to other systems

team.title: Our Team
team.content: We have a diverse team of professionals passionate about technology and communication. Our developers, designers, UX specialists, and business consultants work together to create a platform that truly meets the needs of modern businesses.

difference.title: Our Advantage
items: Fully integrated chat and CRM platform
Intuitive interface that requires no technical knowledge
Scalability to grow with your business
Security and compliance with data protection regulations

future.title: Our Vision for the Future
future.content: We are committed to continuing to evolve Interflow as a leading customer service and CRM platform. Our roadmap includes new integrations, AI-powered features, and even more powerful tools for automation and data analysis.
